name: Order of the Mutant
source: Critical Role / Explorer's Guide to Wildemount
description: Members of the Order of the Mutant enhance their bodies through forbidden alchemy, gaining powerful benefits at the cost of dangerous side effects.

3.name: Mutagen Crafting
3.description: You learn to concoct mutagens—alchemical formulas that grant powerful benefits with accompanying drawbacks.

3.name: Mutagen Use
3.description: As a bonus action, you can consume a mutagen, gaining its benefit and drawback until you finish a short or long rest.

7.name: Strange Metabolism
7.description: When you take damage or suffer a condition from a mutagen’s drawback, you can use your reaction to ignore that effect.

11.name: Advanced Mutagen
11.description: You unlock more potent mutagen formulas with stronger benefits and risks.

15.name: Persistent Mutagen
15.description: Your mutagens last longer and can remain active through short rests.

18.name: Master Alchemist
18.description: You can maintain multiple mutagens at once, mitigating some of their drawbacks.
